Content:
Hello everyone, today I encountered the following problem, or maybe it's not a problem, then I would like to know what it could be.

Here's an example of the first video, the revs are steady, the bike is warmed up and everything is working steadily - video

But after I stop the bike and then start it again, in this video you can see that the bike has cooled down a little bit and it's me who starts it after 5 minutes, the revs start to float somehow unstable, but if I take it for a ride for literally 1 km, it starts to keep the revs steady, like in the first video. So I would like to know if this is normal or if there is some kind of problem. video, video 2
Title: Yamaha fz1n 2011 RPMs are floating
Author: Toxazik
